original_text: Once when Jacob was cooking stew, Esau came in from the field, and he was exhausted.
korean_text: 야곱이 죽을 쑤었더니 에서가 들에서 돌아와서 심히 피곤하여

sentences.original_text: Once when Jacob was cooking stew
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 야곱이 스튜를 끓이고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: Esau came in from the field
